text:
e="preserve">Braian Ezequiel Toledo (8 September 1993 – 27 February 2020) was an Argentine javelin thrower. He improved the World Youth Best in boys' javelin throw by more than six metres.
He won the inaugural javelin title at the 2010 Youth Olympics in Singapore and also won gold at the 2010 South American Youth Championships and 2009 Pan American Junior Championships.
Toledo was killed on 27 February 2020 in a motorcycle accident, aged 26.
